rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient is initiating an appointment booking.
rules.action: Agent asks if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you seen a doctor here before?

rules.title: Verify Established Patient
rules.action: Agent requests identifying information (e.g., phone number, date of birth, full name) to locate and verify their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could you please confirm your phone number and date of birth?

rules.title: Gather New Patient Information
rules.action: Agent asks for the patient's first name, last name, date of birth, and insurance information.
rules.example: Welcome! Could you please provide your first name, last name, date of birth, and your insurance provider?

rules.title: Confirm Doctor and Location
rules.condition: Patient identity and initial appointment type are confirmed.
rules.action: Agent confirms the patient's primary doctor and preferred office location.
rules.example: And just to confirm, is Dr. Smith still your primary physician, and are you looking for an appointment at our downtown office?

rules.title: Request Appointment Timing
rules.condition: Patient identity, primary doctor, and office location are confirmed.
rules.action: Agent asks for the patient's preferred appointment timing (days/times).
rules.example: Great, now that we have your details, what days or times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Offer Available Appointment Slots
rules.condition: After the patient provides their preferred appointment timing and relevant details (doctor, location, appointment type).
rules.action: Agent provides specific available dates and times that match the patient's request or suitable alternatives.
rules.example: Based on your preference for a morning appointment next week, I have an opening with Dr. Smith on Tuesday, November 7th at 9:30 AM. Would that work for you?

rules.title: Confirm Final Appointment Details
rules.condition: After the patient selects a specific appointment slot.
rules.action: Agent explicitly confirms all chosen appointment details: date, time, type of appointment, and provider.
rules.example: Great! Just to confirm, your appointment is scheduled for a follow-up with Dr. Smith on Tuesday, November 7th at 9:30 AM. Does that sound right?

rules.title: Maintain Active Engagement
rules.condition: During information gathering, retrieval, or transition points.
rules.action: Agent acknowledges customer's status or information, informs them when retrieving information, and re-engages after retrieval to clarify next steps or appointment details.
rules.example: Thank you for that information. I'm just pulling up your details now, please hold a moment. Okay, I have your chart open. What type of appointment are you looking to schedule?
